text: John McCann (6 September 1867–1944) was a Scottish footballer who played in the Football League for Preston North End. ==References== Category:1867 births Category:1944 deaths Category:Scottish footballers Category:English Football League players Category:Association football forwards Category:Newcastle West End F.C. players Category:Celtic F.C. players Category:Hibernian F.C. players Category:Preston North End F.C. players
title: John McCann (footballer, born 1867)
